Our typical team structure is highly agile and flat, consisting of 4-6 engineers, a dedicated data scientist, and a product manager, working collaboratively on specific product objectives. We ensure you are fully supported to thrive and rapidly assume leadership responsibilities, aligning perfectly with the fast-track growth trajectory we discussed previously.
